name: FPS Yalghaar War: Shooting Game 3D
description:
The First Person perspective offers you immersive visuals and realistic extreme shooting. Enemies are all around, do not hesitate to kill, Arm yourself with deadly rifles and latest military grade guns. Take a deep breath, aim, lock the target, pull the trigger and kill terrorists. As a real killer and a terrorist hunter, fight against evil and protect your country.
An evil organization ruins the world's peace and happy life with its brutal terrorists and evil plans. Now you are the people's last hope, equip your dangerous weapons and kill thieves and terrorists to save the civilians. Kill or to be killed, you are alone in this dangerous area. Every bullet counts so do not miss a shot.
Amazing wonderful 3d environment and cool animations will make the game best. Challenging missions, realistic sounds and intuitive controls will keep your interest in game. Have you got enough skills that you can kill a terrorist? Download this shooting war game and enjoy season!
How to play:
• Tap the bullet button to open fire.
• Press on screen and adjust your aim
• Tap on left or right buttons to move left or right.
Features:
• Free to play for iPad and iPhone
• Ultra HD 3d Graphics
• Realistic sounds
• Easy and smooth controls
• Beautiful 3d jungle, cave and mountain environment
